name: Don't Touch My Treasure (Atrejo)
description:
The game is not very serious but it can make you angry quickly.  So please have a look at the game where you have to withstand the attacks of an evil rat king for as long as possible.


Lore

You fall into a cave.

You find a coin!
Bob (the fat Rat King) gets angry!

He starts attacking and you start dodging!
You dodge more...

Then you dodge even more...

To be continued...
